activities: Within3 is a privately help company that offers web-based products for Medical Associations and Pharmaceutical companies.  When a clients participating HCP (Healthcare Practioner) joins Within3 we ask for information such as first, middle, and last name, email address, educational history, professional history, licenses, languages spoken, medical affiliation.  Members who sign up do not supply any financial information nor government identification (SSN, Passport ID, Voting ID).  Within3 uses this information for the following general purposes:  product and service provisioning, identification and authentication, services improvement, contact, and research.  Within3 does not share personal information with third parties.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
